name: koop-accela
readme:
# koop-accela

## A simple Accela provider for Koop

## For Developing

## For use within koop

  ```
    # clone Koop:
    git clone git@github.com:Esri/koop.git
    cd koop

    # install depencencies 
    npm install 

    # install koop-accela
    npm install https://github.com/jgravois/koop-accela/tarball/master

    # start the koop server
    node server.js 
  ```
